title: Wiz Khalifa on Being Monogamous, Jimi Hendrix Taking Over Body & White People Using N-Word
description: Wiz Khalifa made his way to Sway in the Morning and opened up entirely about all things music and personal. From being inspired by Jimi Hendrix, and him taking over his body, to White fans saying the N-Word. Wiz's Mother was also in-studio and weighed in as well -- he even mentions smoking with her. Watch below to see Wiz talk about making music for Mortal Kombat, and staying monogamous to wife, Amber Rose.
